title: [Large-Scale] Game-Based Experiential Learning Course for AI Applications and Computational Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and elementary-level language comprehension
context.additional_context: A process design that integrates self-regulated learning strategies into a game-based learning environment using VR devices, simultaneously reducing initial learner anxiety and enhancing long-term memory retention

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three elements of computational thinking (decomposition, pattern recognition, abstraction) to solve real-life problems through AI-based simulation games.
Learners demonstrate an 80% or higher achievement rate in AI concept comprehension assessments using self-regulated learning strategies.
Learners can develop a plan for creating language education content using AI application cases in a VR simulation environment.

resources: AI 2 Robot City board game digital version

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
